4.eng-name: The Book on the Day of Friday
4.ara-name: كِتَاب الْجُمُعَةِ عَنْ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ

hadiths.text: Ibn Umar narrated that :the Prophet said: "When one of you becomes sleepy during the Friday prayer, then let him move from where he is sitting

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِيمَنْ نَعَسَ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ أَنَّهُ يَتَحَوَّلُ مِنْ مَجْلِسِهِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About One Who Becomes Sleepy During The Friday Prayer, And That He Is To Change His Location
